title: Introducing: Sombear
content:
This debut track from Minneapolis’s Sombear is pretty special. The side-project of Bradley Hale of Now, Now, Sombear finds him exploring his electronic and pop influences, and breathing a more expansive atmosphere into first track Easy Thief. Coming in somewhere between Washed Out and Youth Lagoon, there’s a real feel-good, youthful vibe emanated throughout Easy Thief, playing to the simplicity of the track. Whilst this is the only full cut available from Sombear so far, you can hear a snippet of the more upbeat Incredibly Still via his Soundcloud.
